response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and a testament to its worth, which we both recognize at $1,000,000. My offer to you is to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive discount is my way of acknowledging your keen interest and commitment to acquiring such a valuable asset. I trust that this offer will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
